languages.text: "Я не раз унизил{mf||а} тебя, убив твоих братьев и сорвав множество твоих планов. Неужели ты совсем не держишь зла?"
"I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"
languages.original_text: "Я не раз унизил{mf||а} тебя, убив твоих братьев и сорвав множество твоих планов. Неужели ты совсем не держишь зла?"

traits.locale_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice at all?"
"I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice at all?"
"I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"
"I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"
"I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

languages.text: « Je vous ai déshonoré à maintes reprises, j'ai tué vos frères, j'ai fait échouer bon nombre de vos projets... Et malgré tout, vous voudriez me faire croire que vous ne m'en voulez pas le moins du monde ? »
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai déshonoré à maintes reprises, j'ai tué vos frères, j'ai fait échouer bon nombre de vos projets... Et malgré tout, vous voudriez me faire croire que vous ne m'en voulez pas le moins du monde ? »

languages.text: «Te he deshonrado más de una vez, he matado a tus hermanos y he arruinado muchos de tus planes. ¿De verdad he de creer que no sientes ningún rencor hacia mí?».
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

traits.locale_text: «Te he deshonrado más de una vez, he matado a tus hermanos y he arruinado muchos de tus planes. ¿De verdad he de creer que no sientes ningún rencor hacia mí?».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は何度もお前の名誉を傷つけた。兄弟を殺し、計画を破綻させてきた。それでも、{mf|俺|私}に対して悪感情はないというのか？」
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は何度もお前の名誉を傷つけた。兄弟を殺し、計画を破綻させてきた。それでも、{mf|俺|私}に対して悪感情はないというのか？」

languages.text: “我不止一次地使你蒙羞。我杀死了你的兄弟，还破坏了你许多计划，可你现在却告诉我，说你心中对我没有一丁点恨意？”
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

traits.locale_text: “我不止一次地使你蒙羞。我杀死了你的兄弟，还破坏了你许多计划，可你现在却告诉我，说你心中对我没有一丁点恨意？”

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch mehr als einmal entehrt. Ich habe Eure Brüder getötet und viele Eurer Pläne ruiniert. Wollt Ihr mir sagen, Ihr hegt keinerlei Groll gegen mich?"
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch mehr als einmal entehrt. Ich habe Eure Brüder getötet und viele Eurer Pläne ruiniert. Wollt Ihr mir sagen, Ihr hegt keinerlei Groll gegen mich?"

languages.text: "Onurunu birden fazla kez zedeledim. Kardeşlerini öldürdüm ve birçok planını mahvettim. Bana karşı hiç kin beslemediğini mi söylüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "I have disgraced you more than once, I have killed your brothers and ruined many of your plans. Are you telling me that you harbour no malice toward me at all?"
